name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a skilled **DevOps Engineer** with 8 years of experience, I excel in provisioning and managing **multi-region AWS environments** utilizing services such as **AWS** (EKS, RDS, IAM, VPC, S3) alongside containerization tools like **Docker** and **Kubernetes**. Proficient in **Infrastructure as Code** using **Terraform**, **OpenTofu**, and **Crossplane**, I ensure efficient deployment and management of cloud resources. My expertise extends to monitoring solutions with **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, and **CloudWatch**, and I leverage CI/CD automation with **GitLab** and **Flux** for seamless integration and delivery.

I have a robust understanding of **service mesh architectures** using **Linkerd** and **Istio**, and I champion **networking and security controls** that align with best practices for **disaster recovery** and **business continuity planning**. With a background in **cloud technologies** and full-stack development utilizing **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, I bring a diverse skill set to designing and implementing secure, high-performance solutions. My commitment to robust architecture and system resilience is demonstrated through my work in developing enterprise-grade platforms that incorporate predictive analytics, intelligent automation, and real-time data processing.
